query: Could you draft a 7-day travel plan for two people beginning in Detroit and journeying through 3 cities in Florida from March 2nd to March 8th, 2022? We have a budget of $7,500. Please note that we require accommodations where smoking is permissible. We will not be self-driving, so suitable transportation arrangements need to be made. We are food enthusiasts with a preference for Chinese, Indian, Italian, and French cuisines.
actions: choose_city_bundle:[Orlando,Daytona Beach,Jacksonville]
